'''Bedrock Editor v0.8.8''', is a minor beta release for the [[Bedrock Editor]] released on February 12, 2025, which adds a button related API.<ref>https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/222</ref><ref>https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/34234917741325</ref>

== Additions ==
* Added {{cd|IButtonPanePropertyItem}} API for customizing button layouts.
** {{cd|IPropertyPane.addButtonPane}} and {{cd|IModalControlPane.addButtonPane}} API methods to create button pane items.

== Changes ==
* Updated the mouse indicator for various tools to no longer linger after the app is suspended and resumed.
* Updated the maximum allowed line segments in Line Tool to 40 to address a crash.
